title: Mauritius Travel Guide
content: Mauritius is known for its beaches, lagoons, and reefs. Popular spots include Grand Baie, Flic en Flac, and Le Morne Brabant. Best travel months: May to December.

title: Visa Requirements
content: Most visitors do not require a visa for stays up to 90 days. Ensure your passport is valid for at least 6 months from the date of entry.

title: Flight Information
content: Direct flights are available from major cities such as Paris, Dubai, and Johannesburg to Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport.
